title: Fragment, 1st part 20th century
medium:
Medium: silk; gouache; ink
Techinque: painted on satin weave
description: Bright grass-green satin with large central medallion with flowers, peaches, lucky emblems, lotus arabesque in each corner, narrow floral border with two sides. In dark gray and brilliant colors of ink and thick goauche paint, which is worn and cracked in places. Narrow twilled selvage.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 1st part 20th century.Medium: silk; gouache; ink
Techinque: painted on satin weave. 1957-92-27.
